item.title: By: Alex James fans Blur reunion flames, Drawer B

item.description: [...] Think Tank, only featured guitarist Graham Coxon on one song, while its last record as a quartet, 13, came out in the spring of 1999. James is optimistic after texting his erstwhile bandmate and [...]
